original: Kāmā hi loke na hi suppahāyā.
analyzed: kāmāḥ hi loke na hi su ppahāyā

original: Ime va kāme purime va jappaṁ.
analyzed: ime va kāme purime va jappa
tasmai hi sikkhetha idha iva jantu
hīnāḥ narāḥ mad cu mukhe lapanti
a vīta taṇhā se bhava abhavesu
macchā iva appa udake khīṇa sote
yad atta garahī tad a kubbamānaḥ
na asi isatī lokam imam paran ca ati
